entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
